titles.title: A resolution designating the week of September 14 through September 20, 2025, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".
A resolution designating the week of September 14 through September 20, 2025, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution designates September 14-September 20, 2025, as National Truck Driver Appreciation Week.
